Text:
350mbs?! What is this, 1992? Will this work on my Casio wristwatch? Synchronize Swatches?!

Couldn't you are least break this into separate floppy-sized chunks so I don't clog up my Winmodem?
Take the loaf out of your ass and show some respect for the uploader.
everyone knows 350 mb is the new 699 mb

Great copy.

As usual, A10/V10.

I really appreciate your amazing-quality uploads!
hahahaha very funny loaf,,but some of us prefer smaller file sizes,some because of speed and some because of less HD space.
+1 Thanks.  Good movie.  Nice quality.  It even has Deb from Dexter in it. lol

Not compatible with ConvertXtoDVD.  You will get green screen with sound only.  Plays fine with VLC Player.  Now that I think about it.  I downloaded That's My Boy from you a while back and had the same problem.  I burn MKV files all the time not sure what is different with your encodings. I like your uploads I just don't like having to watch everything on my computer.
Converted OK with VSOConvertXToDVD5 v5.0.0.27. After viewing comments will be updated if conversion wasn't OK. Thanks varuttee for the trouble you always take.
